lead_paragraph: Random House announces that Peter Burchette, Burma and India correspondent of The London Daily Express, has been signed to write a book on the adventures of "Wingate's mob" in Burma this spring. Brigadier Wingate, with a handpicked group of British Army men, crossed the Japanese lines into Burma last February, and after four months of guerrilla fighting behind the lines, managed to cross into British-held territory in May.
abstract: Book Com repts on '43 drive results
